original: Bernt, marindirektör, Göteborg, f. 12’/8/12 i Kneippbaden, Öster-götl. 1., av fil. dr Gotthard W. o. Signe Baeckström. — Stud:ex. v. Upps. h. a. 1. 30, civ :ing :ex. v. KTH 34. Stud :resa t. Engl. o. Skottl. 35-36. Anst. v. A-B de Lavals Ångturbin o. A-B Götaverken 34-36, e. marining. 36, marining. av 2. gr. 39, m^arining. av 1. gr. 41, förste marining. 44, marindir. av 2. gr. 46. Ombyggn ring. v. Kariskr. örlogsvarv 36-38, fartygsing. å pansarskepp 38-41, sektionschef i marinförv. 41-44’, ma-rinförv. kontr. v. nybyggn. av kryssare fr. 44. Kadetting. v. KiSS 40, lär. i skeppsbyggeri v. KSHS 41-44. , Karl Erik, stadsingenjör, Skövde, f. 3il/l/96 i Karfekro-na av lektor Karl V. o. Ellen Nilsson. G. 21 m. Sonja Munthe. Barn: Gunnar f. 22, Ingrid 24, Sven 28. — Studrex. i Häl-singb. 12, stud. v. KTH (V) 13-17. Konstr. v. A-B Vattenbyggn ibyrån i Sthlm 18-30, undering. v. Sthlms stads hamustyr. hamnbyggn :avd. v. bygg. av Hammarb>4eden 20-22, avd :ing. v. södra Sv:es statsarb. i Växjö 22-24, stadsing. i Skövde sed. 24.
translated:
Bernt, naval director, Gothenburg, b. 12th of August 1912 in Kneippbaden, Östergötland, 1st district, son of Ph.D. Gotthard W. and Signe Baeckström. — High school diploma from Uppsala in 1930, civil engineering diploma from KTH in 1934. Studied abroad in England and Scotland in 1935-1936. Employed by A-B de Lavals Ångturbin and A-B Götaverken from 1934 to 1936, naval cadet from 1936, promoted to naval engineer (2nd degree) in 1939, promoted to naval engineer (1st degree) in 1941, senior naval engineer in 1944, promoted to naval director (2nd degree) in 1946. Responsible for the reconstruction of the Kariskr. naval shipyard from 1936 to 1938, ship engineer on armored ships from 1938 to 1941, section chief in naval administration from 1941 to 1944, naval administration contractor for the construction of cruisers from 1944. Cadet at KiSS in 1940, teacher in shipbuilding at KSHS from 1941 to 1944. 

Karl Erik, city engineer, Skövde, b. 31st of January 1896 in Karfekrona, son of lecturer Karl V. and Ellen Nilsson. Married Sonja Munthe in 1921. Children: Gunnar b. 1922, Ingrid b. 1924, Sven b. 1928. — High school diploma in Helsingborg in 1912, studied at KTH (V) from 1913 to 1917. Construction engineer at A-B Vattenbyggnadsbyrån in Stockholm from 1918 to 1930, assistant engineer at the Stockholm City Port Authority's harbor construction department for the construction of Hammarby Dock from 1920 to 1922, engineering department at the southern Swedish state agency in Växjö from 1922 to 1924, city engineer in Skövde since 1924.
